00026     OcclusionElement::~OcclusionElement() 
00027     {
00028         #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00029             delete mDebugRectangle2d;
00030         #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG  
00031         
00032         NodeDataPerCamMapiterator i = nodeDataPerCam.begin ();
00033         while (i != nodeDataPerCam.end())
00034         {
00035             delete i->second;
00036             ++i;
00037         }
00038         nodeDataPerCam.clear();
00039     }  
00040     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00041     VisibilityData *OcclusionElement::getNodeData(PagingLandScapeOctreeCamera *cam)
00042     {
00043         if (nodeDataPerCam.find(cam->getId()) == nodeDataPerCam.end())
00044             nodeDataPerCam[cam->getId()] = new VisibilityData();
00045         //assert (nodeDataPerCam.find(cam->getId()) != nodeDataPerCam.end());
00046         return nodeDataPerCam[cam->getId()];
00047     }
00048     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00049     void OcclusionElement::addCamNodeData (PagingLandScapeOctreeCamera *cam)
00050     {
00051         if (nodeDataPerCam.find(cam->getId()) == nodeDataPerCam.end())
00052             nodeDataPerCam[cam->getId()] = new VisibilityData();
00053     }
00054     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00055     void OcclusionElement::removeCamNodeData (PagingLandScapeOctreeCamera *cam)
00056     {
00057         NodeDataPerCamMapiterator i = nodeDataPerCam.find (cam->getId());
00058         if (i != nodeDataPerCam.end())
00059         {
00060             delete i->second;
00061                 nodeDataPerCam.erase (i);
00062         }
00063     }
00064     #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
